channel.title: General Electric Company (R-033)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: NorthStar Vallecitos, LLC, Request for NRC Authorization of Reviewing Official
item.description: Letter
item.author: NorthStar Vallecitos, LLC

item.title: Ack receipt of 980417 ltr informing NRC of steps taken to correct violations noted in insp repts 50-070/98-201, 50-073/98-201 & 50-183/98-201.First example of violation 2 has been withdrawn.Actions examined during future insp.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC (Affiliation Not Assigned)

item.title: Forwards insp repts 50-070/98-201,50-073/98-201 & 50-183/98-201 on 980209-13 & notice of violation.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC (Affiliation Not Assigned)

item.title: Notice of violation from insp on 980209-13.Violation noted: licensee failed to comply with requirements of section 12 of physical security plan.
item.description: NOTICE OF VIOLATION OF A REGULATION, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC (Affiliation Not Assigned)

item.title: Insp repts 50-070/98-201,50-073/98-201 & 50-183/98-201 on 980209-13.Violations noted.Major areas inspected:review of safeguards programs,security program,procedures,radiation protection & matl control.
item.description: INSPECTION REPORT, NRC-GENERATED, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC (Affiliation Not Assigned)

item.title: Supports use of financial test to demonstrate financial responsibility under self-guarantee rule which became effective on 940128.GE 1998 annual rept encl.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: GENERAL ELECTRIC CO.

item.title: Informs of recent reorganization of NRR.T Michaels assigned as project manager for facilities.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Forwards revised NRC Form 398.Rev reflects changes to 10CFR55 effective on 870526.Revised form requires new applications to complete each category including educ, training & experience.Changes detailed in Encl 2.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Forwards revised scheduled A,which increased cost estimate for license SMB-191.Other items remain as submitted.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: GENERAL ELECTRIC CO.

item.title: Informs that self-guarantee documents submitted 970328 & 1015,are in compliance w/10CFR30 App C.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR MATERIAL SAFETY and SAFEGUARDS (NMSS)

item.title: Lists change in telephone number for H Bernard,facility project manager,due to NRR reorganization.D Tondi new Nonpower Reactors & Safeguards Licensing Section leader. Correspondence should be sent to listed address.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.author: GENERAL ELECTRIC CO.

item.title: Comment opposing proposed rules 10CFR170 & 171 re insp & annual fees for FY 1999.GE requests NRC reconsider application of proposed fee structure to VBWR,in possession only status with no spent fuel stored on-site.
item.description: LEGAL TRANSCRIPTS & ORDERS & PLEADINGS, PUBLIC COMMENTS ON PROPOSED RULES & PETITIONS FOR

item.title: Forwards insp repts 50-070/99-301,50-073/99-201 & 50-183/99-201 on 990607-10.No safety concern or noncompliance to NRC requirements was identified.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC (Affiliation Not Assigned)

item.description: ANNUAL REPORTS (COMPANY-FINANCIAL), TEXT-SAFETY REPORT

item.title: PNO-V-88-038:on 880612,earthquake occurred on Calaveras Fault within 50 miles of identified facilities.All reactors shutdown at time of earthquake.No seismic trips observed. Insp revealed no signs of damage at facilities.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Informs of relocation of NRR to Rockville,MD.Official mailing address still remains same & project managers have new locations & phone numbers.TS Michaels still lead project manager for facility & A Adams will serve as backup.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO PUBLIC ENTITY/CITIZEN/ORGANIZATION/MEDIA, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: GE-Hitachi Nuclear Energy Americas, LLC, Vallecitos Nuclear Center (VNC) Organization Change
item.description: Letter
item.author: GE-Hitachi Nuclear Energy Americas, LLC

item.title: PNO-V-88-044:on 880627,earthquake occurred 5 miles east of Santa Cruz,CA.Seismic instrumentation not triggered at Vallecitos,Aerotest operations or at Univ of California at Berkeley.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Generic Ltr 80-38 to all nonpower reactor licensees re NPR physical protection requirements.Summary of certain NPR physical protection requirements encl & should aid in determining safeguards requirements applicable to facility.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, GENERIC LETTERS, GENERIC LETTERS & IE LETTERS TO MULTIPLE PLANTS., OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
